attributes.action: ensure that any order for compensation made by the courts arising out the case where a man was divorced because the CSA sent him a completely innaccurate letter regarding fatherhood of a child, is paid for by the CSA official who authorised the sending of the letter AND NOT THE TAXPAYER.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Yet more examples of people in taxpayer funded jobs being able to do what they wish, when they wish because they know they will not be held accountable.  THE TAXPAYER should not be liable for compensation orders arising out of this recently notified case.
